a.style: background: #5865F2; width: 8rem; height: 7.5rem; border-radius: 0.5rem; padding: 0.8rem; color: white; display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: flex-end; position: relative

div.style: position: absolute; inset: 0; background: radial-gradient(circle at top left, rgba(0,0,0,0), rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2));

img.style: position: absolute; top: 1rem; left: 1rem; filter: drop-shadow(0 4px 3px rgb(0 0 0 / 0.07)) drop-shadow(0 2px 2px rgb(0 0 0 / 0.06));

div.style: font-weight: 600; filter: drop-shadow(0 4px 3px rgb(0 0 0 / 0.07)) drop-shadow(0 2px 2px rgb(0 0 0 / 0.06));
font-weight: 400; font-size: 12px; filter: drop-shadow(0 4px 3px rgb(0 0 0 / 0.07)) drop-shadow(0 2px 2px rgb(0 0 0 / 0.06)); margin-top: -0.2rem
